name: A girdle of white marble
data: It increases the users strength a good amount.
It increases the users constitution somewhat.
It increases the users wisdom somewhat.
It decreases the users intelligence somewhat.
It has magnificent armour class for its type (pathetic in general).
This item loses its magical powers slowly.
It gives nice bonus to the skill 'charge'.
It gives nice bonus to the skill 'hew'.
The girdle controls the wearer's breathing, slightly curbing exhaustion.
